title: I can't join my main club?
body:
For about a week now, I've been unable to join my main club, which has/had close to the max number of allowed members. I mean, I can still use the tag, but club chat is completely non-functional.

Any info on this happening elsewhere?

replies.body: I took a look into this and it seems there were some changes made to the club that may have caused the issue to become resolved. Let me know if you're still experiencing this issue.
